description: The Moon's shadow plunged the Pacific coast of Mexico into total darkness at 11:07 am local time and will sweep across the United States, before returning to the ocean over Canada's Atlantic coast just under an hour-and-a-half after landfall.
title: Total solar eclipse races across North America

description: Monday's total eclipse of the sun will begin in the Pacific and make landfall at Mazatlan, Mexico, before moving into Texas, Oklahoma, Arkansas and 12 other US states in the Midwest, Middle Atlantic and New England, and then Canada.
title: Millions gather in North America to catch a glimpse of a total solar eclipse
